articles.title: Migrants stuck at Poland-Belarus border deal with dropping temperatures as tensions rise - CBC.ca
articles.description: Hundreds of migrants shivered in freezing temperatures and huddled around campfires on the Belarusian border with Poland on Tuesday in front of razor-wire fences and lines of Polish border guards blocking their entry into the European Union.

articles.title: European Tour to become DP World Tour in historic naming rights deal from next season - Sky Sports
articles.description: DP World will become the title sponsor of the European Tour as part of a history-making agreement from next season.
articles.content:
DP World will become the title sponsor of the European Tour as part of a history-making agreement from next season.
